title: Awesome gamemode idea
body: I thought it would be really cool if riot made a game mode where the bots are really strong, and i dont mean like doom bots. I mean like perfect cs'ing skills, coordination dodge abilities, so it would be really hard to beat them, which would make it fun :)

replies.body:
Better idea.

Take the doombot idea, except give players control of the doombotted champs in a 3v3 royale!
it isnt easy to program the bots, they have to try put in as many scenarios as possible and it would take ages for them. Still would be abit like doom bots if they're just strong bots...
Not to mention the fact that OCE doesn't even support all the standard gamemodes yet.
